class tests.model.random_data.BiometricsRandomData(seed: Optional[int] = None)ÔÉÅ

Bases: RandomData

A subclass of tests.RandomData the provides random values particular to the biometrics_tracking package

Provides a random date in the range 1/1/1940 to 12/31/1970

Returns

a random date

Return type

random_dom(month: int, max_dom: int) → list[int]ÔÉÅ

Returns a randomly chosen list of days of the month

Parameters

  • max_dom (int) ‚Äì the maximum number of days to be returned
